generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending across the frame, including the area in front of the vehicle.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the left side of the road, bordered by a curb, with pedestrians walking on it.
- building: Several buildings are visible in the background, including multi-story structures with windows and architectural features.
- vegetation: Trees are visible throughout the scene, lining the streets and surrounding the buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: Multiple people are visible walking on the sidewalk and crossing the street.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible on the left side of the road, near the sidewalk.
- car: A silver van is visible on the left side of the road, parked or moving slowly.
- truck: A large truck is partially visible on the right side of the image, with its side and front wheel in view.
- traffic light: A red traffic light is visible in the upper right portion of the image.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and street lamps.
- traffic sign: A blue parking sign (with a "P") is visible on the right side of the image.
- terrain: Some patches of grass or vegetation are visible along the edge of the sidewalk and road.
